messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] DELETE, Scanners, A Cold, Etc...
messages.msgSnippet: ... Rolling on the Floor, Laughing Out Loud, and I can t get the rest.  I got the cold that the kids had and I have been miserably sick and have no energy for
messages.messageBody:
>HEY??? have ya'll given up yet??? did ya figure out my
>***ROFLOLWSDDOMM***??? hehe ...
>
>Pris

Rolling on the Floor, Laughing Out Loud, and I can't get the rest. I got the cold that the kids had and I have been miserably sick and have no energy for thinking. By the way, sorry to have not answered anyone who asked me about scanning photos. I got sick just at that point and was offline a few days. AS you can imagine, I had quite a lot of mail to go through, and I am not done yet.

However, thanks to everyone for the comments on the photo that I posted. She is not our daughter, but we hope that she might be. She is one of the children that we are being considered for as adoptive parents. I know most of you know this, but it seemed that there was some confusion about it, so I thought I would clarify. I pulled the picture directly off of a weblisting of children available for adoption. I did not scan it. SO I am not a paragon of knowledge for how to make scanners work. In fact I got one for my birthday last year and am still figuring our how to make it work. Sorry!

Nanci K.
